mapper.select: select driver_id from jy_driver_info where driver_suppliers =#{id}

select citycode from jy_city_info where
cityname like "%${_parameter}%"

select citycode from jy_city where
cityname like "%${_parameter}%"

select suppliers_id from jy_suppliers where
suppliers_name like "%${param1}%"
or suppliers_address like "%${param2}%"

SELECT js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname, ji.driver_address,concat(ji.driver_cardnumber,' ') as driver_cardnumber,ji.driver_carnumber, ji.driver_cartype,ji.driver_city,ji.driver_county, ji.driver_createtime,ji.driver_id,ji.driver_name, ji.driver_phone,ji.driver_phonebrand,ji.driver_phonemodel, ji.driver_province,ji.driver_remarks,ji.driver_suppliers, ji.driver_updatedate,ji.driver_updatepeople,ji.is_supperlis FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id=ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_customer jcu ON FIND_IN_SET( jcu.customer_id,js.suppliers_customer) LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.customer_id =jcu.customer_id WHERE ju.id=#{param8}

SELECT js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname, ji.driver_address,concat(ji.driver_cardnumber,' ') as driver_cardnumber,ji.driver_carnumber, ji.driver_cartype,ji.driver_city,ji.driver_county, ji.driver_createtime,ji.driver_id,ji.driver_name, ji.driver_phone,ji.driver_phonebrand,ji.driver_phonemodel, ji.driver_province,ji.driver_remarks,ji.driver_suppliers, ji.driver_updatedate,ji.driver_updatepeople,ji.is_supperlis FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.driver_id = ji.driver_id where ju.id = #{param8}

SELECT js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname, ji.driver_address,concat(ji.driver_cardnumber,' ') as driver_cardnumber,ji.driver_carnumber, ji.driver_cartype,ji.driver_city,ji.driver_county, ji.driver_createtime,ji.driver_id,ji.driver_name, ji.driver_phone,ji.driver_phonebrand,ji.driver_phonemodel, ji.driver_province,ji.driver_remarks,ji.driver_suppliers, ji.driver_updatedate,ji.driver_updatepeople,ji.is_supperlis FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where ji.driver_suppliers = #{param8}

SELECT js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname, ji.driver_address,concat(ji.driver_cardnumber,' ') as driver_cardnumber ,ji.driver_carnumber, ji.driver_cartype,ji.driver_city,ji.driver_county, ji.driver_createtime,ji.driver_id,ji.driver_name, ji.driver_phone,ji.driver_phonebrand,ji.driver_phonemodel, ji.driver_province,ji.driver_remarks,ji.driver_suppliers, ji.driver_updatedate,ji.driver_updatepeople,ji.is_supperlis FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where 1=1
mapper.sql:
and ji.driver_id in
#{item}
and ji.driver_name like "%${param1}%"
and js.suppliers_name like "${param2}"
and ji.driver_phone like "%${param3}%"
and ji.driver_cardnumber like "%${param4}%"
and ji.driver_address like "%${param5}%"
and ji.driver_id IN (SELECT jdo.driver_id from jy_drivertoorder jdo LEFT JOIN jy_shiping_order jso ON jso.shiping_order_id=jdo.order_id where 1=1
and jso.shiping_order_num like '%${param6}%'
and jso.shiping_order_goid like '%${param7}%'
)
ORDER BY ji.driver_address ASC
mapper.select: SELECT ji.*,js.supplie_company,ju.username AS userName, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.driver_id = ji.driver_id where ji.driver_suppliers = #{param10}

select count(*) FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_drivertoorder do ON do.driver_id=ji.driver_id LEFT JOIN jy_shiping_order so ON so.shiping_order_id=do.order_id where 1=1 and ji.driver_suppliers = #{param8}

if.test: (param6!=null and param6!='') or ( param7!=null and param7!='')

sql.if:
and ji.driver_id IN (SELECT jdo.driver_id from jy_drivertoorder jdo LEFT JOIN jy_shiping_order jso ON jso.shiping_order_id=jdo.order_id where 1=1
and jso.shiping_order_num like '%${param6}%'
and jso.shiping_order_goid like '%${param7}%'
)

mapper.select: SELECT ji.*,js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname,ju.username AS userName FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.driver_id = ji.driver_id LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where 1=1
select count(*) FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where 1=1

SELECT ji.*,js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname,ju.username AS userName FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.driver_id = ji.driver_id where ju.id = #{param10}
select count(*) FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_travel_card jtc ON jtc.travel_card_id = ji.car_id where ji.driver_name = #{param1} and jtc.travel_card_id =#{param2}
select count(*) FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.driver_id = ji.driver_id where 1=1 and ju.id = #{param8}
mapper.delete:
delete from jy_driver_info where driver_suppliers IN
#{item}

delete from jy_driver_info where driver_id IN
#{item}
mapper.insert:
insert into jy_drivertoorder( id, driver_id, order_id, updatetime, equipmentNum, userName )VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.driver_id}, #{item.order_id}, NOW(), #{item.equipmentNum}, #{item.userName} )

insert into jy_driver_info
driver_id,
driver_name,
driver_phone,
driver_cardnumber,
driver_updatedate,
driver_updatepeople,
driver_createtime,
driver_suppliers,
driver_province,
driver_city,
driver_county,
driver_address,
driver_remarks,
driver_carnumber,
driver_cartype,
driver_phonemodel,
driver_phonebrand,
is_supperlis,
driver_sex,
driver_age,
start_time
#{driver_id},
#{driver_name},
#{driver_phone},
#{driver_cardnumber},
#{driver_updatedate},
#{driver_updatepeople},
now(),
#{driver_suppliers},
#{driver_province},
#{driver_city},
#{driver_county},
#{driver_address},
#{driver_remarks},
#{driver_carnumber},
#{driver_cartype},
#{driver_phonemodel},
#{driver_phonebrand},
#{is_supperlis},
#{driver_sex},
#{driver_age},
#{start_time}
mapper.select: SELECT ji.*, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where ji.driver_id=#{driverId}
mapper.update:
update jy_driver_info
driver_name = #{driver_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_phone = #{driver_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_cardnumber = #{driver_cardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_updatedate = now(),
driver_updatepeople = #{driver_updatepeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_suppliers = #{driver_suppliers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_province = #{driver_province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_city = #{driver_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_county = #{driver_county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_address = #{driver_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_remarks = #{driver_remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_carnumber = #{driver_carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_cartype = #{driver_cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_phonemodel = #{driver_phonemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_phonebrand = #{driver_phonebrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver_sex = #{driver_sex},
driver_age = #{driver_age},
start_time = #{start_time}
where driver_id = #{driver_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from jy_driver_info
where car_id like "%${_parameter}%"

select * from jy_driver_info
where driver_id like "%${_parameter}%"

SELECT DISTINCT jtc.travel_card_id,jtc.plate_number FROM jy_travel_card jtc INNER JOIN jy_driver_info ji ON ji.car_id=jtc.travel_card_id
WHERE jtc.plate_number like "%${_parameter}%"

SELECT jtc.suppliers_id as suppliersId,jtc.suppliers_name as suppliersName FROM jy_suppliers jtc
WHERE jtc.suppliers_name like "%${_parameter}%"
SELECT j.* FROM j_position_info j WHERE j.oneid!=0 and j.twoid=0 and j.threeid=0
SELECT j.* FROM j_position_info j WHERE 1=1 and j.oneid=#{0} and j.twoid!=0 and j.threeid=0
SELECT j.* FROM j_position_info j WHERE 1=1 and j.oneid=#{0} and j.twoid=#{1} and j.threeid!=0

select driver_id,update_date from jy_driver_info
where update_date like "%${_parameter}%"

SELECT DISTINCT jtc.travel_card_id,jtc.plate_number FROM jy_travel_card jtc INNER JOIN jy_driver_info ji ON ji.car_id=jtc.travel_card_id WHERE ji.ptype=0
and jtc.plate_number like "%${_parameter}%"

SELECT * FROM jy_driver_info WHERE ptype<>0
and car_id = #{_parameter}
SELECT j.* FROM j_position_info j WHERE j.id in (#{0},#{1},#{2})
SELECT * FROM jy_city_info jci WHERE jci.city_type=1 AND jci.citye_parent_id=1
SELECT jci.* FROM jy_city_info jci LEFT JOIN jy_city_info jci2 ON jci.citye_parent_id =jci2.citycode AND jci.city_type = jci2.city_type+1 WHERE jci.citye_parent_id=#{id}
SELECT jdic.driver_province AS province,jdic.driver_city AS city,jdic.driver_county AS county FROM jy_driver_info_cityinfo jdic WHERE driver_id=#{0}
mapper.delete:
DELETE from jy_driver_info_cityinfo WHERE driver_id IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
SELECT ji.*,js.supplie_company, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname FROM jy_driver_info ji
LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id = ji.driver_suppliers where 1=1
and ji.driver_suppliers =#{_parameter}
ORDER BY ji.driver_createtime ASC
select * from jy_driver_info where driver_suppliers=#{id}

SELECT ji.*,js.supplie_company,jsu.username as userName, js.suppliers_name as driver_suppliersname FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id=ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_customer jcu ON FIND_IN_SET( jcu.customer_id,js.suppliers_customer) LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.customer_id =jcu.customer_id LEFT JOIN jy_user jsu ON jsu.driver_id = ji.driver_id where ju.id=#{param10}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jy_driver_info ji LEFT JOIN jy_suppliers js ON js.suppliers_id=ji.driver_suppliers LEFT JOIN jy_customer jcu ON FIND_IN_SET( jcu.customer_id,js.suppliers_customer) LEFT JOIN jy_user ju ON ju.customer_id =jcu.customer_id WHERE ju.id=#{param8}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS num,ju.username as username FROM jy_equipment_info jei INNER JOIN jy_user ju ON jei.username = ju.username WHERE ju.driver_id=#{driverId};
mapper.insert:
insert into jy_driver_info( driver_id,
driver_name,
driver_phone,
driver_cardnumber,
driver_updatedate,
driver_updatepeople,
driver_createtime,
driver_suppliers,
driver_province,
driver_city,
driver_county,
driver_address,
driver_remarks,
driver_carnumber,
driver_cartype,
driver_phonemodel,
driver_phonebrand,
is_supperlis,
driver_sex,
driver_age )
values
( #{item.driver_id},
#{item.driver_name},
#{item.driver_phone},
#{item.driver_cardnumber},
#{item.driver_updatedate},
#{item.driver_updatepeople},
now(),
#{item.driver_suppliers},
#{item.driver_province},
#{item.driver_city},
#{item.driver_county},
#{item.driver_address},
#{item.driver_remarks},
#{item.driver_carnumber},
#{item.driver_cartype},
#{item.driver_phonemodel},
#{item.driver_phonebrand},
#{item.is_supperlis},
#{item.driver_sex},
#{item.driver_age} )

insert into jy_User( id, username, password, realname, did, lasttime, state, flag, createtime, channelId, device_type, driver_id, suppliers_id, user_province, user_city, user_county, user_address, customer_id )values
(#{item.id},#{item.username},#{item.password},#{item.realName},#{item.did},null,"1",#{item.flag},SYSDATE(),null,null,#{item.driver_id},#{item.suppliers_id},#{item.user_province},#{item.user_city},#{item.user_county},#{item.user_address},#{item.customer_id})
